day1.title: Maa Shailputri ka Aashirvaad 🙏
day1.message: Cab bulayi? Nahi bulayi? Maa bhi soch rahi hongi – Olyox se bulalo 😅

day1.title: Navratri Start Ho Gaya 🎉
day1.message: Aaj ride lo aur cashback bhi lo – warna phir regret hi regret 😂

day1.title: Mandir Ride Easy 🚕
day1.message: Darshan ki soch rahe ho? Taxi bulane ka option: Olyox ✅ Uber ❌

day1.title: Ride with Blessings 🌼
day1.message: Maa Shailputri: ‘Beta safe jaana!’ Olyox: ‘Done, low fare bhi milega!’ 😉

day1.title: Lowest Fare Guarantee 💸
day1.message: 40% tak saving = Maa bhi bolegi ‘Shabaash bacche’ 😂

day1.title: Garba Night Ready 💃
day1.message: Dandiya me late? Olyox bulalo – warna dhol band ho jayega 🥁🤣

day1.title: Har Ride pe Saving 🎊
day1.message: Maths simple hai: Cashback + Low Fare = Olyox = Dil khush ❤️

day1.title: Bhakti + Comfort 🙌
day1.message: Mandir tak seat comfort wali, gaana bhakti wala 🎶

day1.title: One App, All Rides 🚖
day1.message: Bike 🏍️ | Auto 🛺 | Taxi 🚕 | Truck 🚚 – sab ek hi app me! Combo pack 😎

day1.title: Family Safe Ride 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
day1.message: Maa bolegi: ‘Beta Olyox se hi jaana!’ Aur beta bolega: ‘Yes Maa 😇’

day1.title: Refer aur Kamao 💰
day1.message: Dost bulao, cashback kamao. Friendship goals 💯

day1.title: Aaj ka Special Offer 🎁
day1.message: Aaj cashback miss kiya toh kal sirf regret milega 😅

day1.title: Garba Ground Ride 🎶
day1.message: Dance floor pe pahuchne se pehle booking confirm karo 😜

day1.title: Transparent Fare ❌
day1.message: Hidden charge? Arre bhai, Olyox me sab asli. Zindagi jaisi hi 😌

day1.title: Quick Booking ⚡
day1.message: 2 click = ride confirm. Abhi try karo, warna 3rd click me late ho jaoge 😆

day1.title: Comfort Ride 🚕
day1.message: Short ho ya long route, Olyox bole – chill maar ke baith ja bro ✌️

day1.title: Safe Driver, Safe Ride 👮
day1.message: Olyox drivers = Trust level 100%. Abhi ride leke test karo 🚖

day1.title: Festival Special 🎊
day1.message: Navratri ride = Cashback ride = Best ride 🔥

day1.title: Mandir ka Safar 🌸
day1.message: Darshan safe + fare low = Maa bhi khush, aap bhi khush 🙏

day1.title: Book Now 👉
day1.message: Scroll band karo, Olyox App kholo, ride book karo 😎
